serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.text: Try to visit this page little later

inDev.title: in development
inDev.text: Currently this page is being developed.

notifications.lang: Language has been changed to {{ lang }}

createPassword.label: Create Password
createPassword.helper: Passwords must be at least 8 characters

loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.text: Keep track of your money and save for your future
loginPage.subtext: Personal finance app puts you in control of your spending. Track transactions, set budgets, and add to savings pots easily.

addnew.title: Add New Budget
addnew.notification: Budget '{{ title }}' has been added to the database

delete.title: Delete '{{ title }}'
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this budget? This action cannot be reversed, and all the data inside it will be removed forever.
delete.notification: Budget '{{ title }}' has been deleted from the database

addmoney.title: Add to '{{ title }}'
addmoney.errorText: It can't be more than {{ amount }}
addmoney.notification: You've added money to your target for '{{ title }}'

withdraw.title: Withdraw from '{{ title }}'
withdraw.errorText: It can't be more than {{ amount }}
withdraw.notification: You've withdrawn money from your target for '{{ title }}'

addnew.title: Add New Pot
addnew.text: Create a pot to set savings targets. These can help keep you on track as you save for special purchases.
addnew.notification: Pot '{{ title }}' has been added to the database

edit.title: Edit Pot
edit.text: If your saving targets change, feel free to update your pots.

delete.title: Delete '{{ title }}'?
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this pot? This action cannot be reversed, and all the data inside it will be removed forever.
delete.notification: Pot '{{ title }}' has been deleted from the database
